description:
A edging machine, the Mago excels where precise footwork is key. The most supportive lace-up option from Scarpa's Specialized line, they have an aggressive shape and high toe angle that focuses power on your big toe, providing a solid platform when you're standing on micro footholds in steep terrain. The new perforated microfibre upper has some give to it, allowing the shoe to suck up against your foot when laced tightly.

  • Microsuede upper with Alcantara fibres in toe area for a consistent fit over time
  • X-Tension™ active rand supports your arch and forefoot
  • PAF heel system distributes the pressure on the heel for a comfortable fit
  • Ultra-sticky M50 toe rubber patch helps stick to finicky toe hooks
  • TPS midsole insert provides support without losing sensitivity
  • Vibram® XS Grip 2 rubber provides exceptional friction and sensitivity
  • Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size
name: Scarpa Mago Rock Shoes - Unisex
